languages.text: Оборона обители Адептус Механикус пала, критически требуется вмешательство Вольного Торговца в ситуацию. Согласно данным о монастыре, благословенная энергетическая установка сокрыта в недрах захваченного мятежниками храмового комплекса. Лишь оградив панели управления реликвией от влияния еретиков, можно обеспечить ее защиту.

The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.
languages.original_text: Оборона обители Адептус Механикус пала, критически требуется вмешательство Вольного Торговца в ситуацию. Согласно данным о монастыре, благословенная энергетическая установка сокрыта в недрах захваченного мятежниками храмового комплекса. Лишь оградив панели управления реликвией от влияния еретиков, можно обеспечить ее защиту.

Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

languages.text: Die Verteidigung des Klosters des Adeptus Mechanicus wurde überwunden: Das sofortige Eingreifen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist erforderlich. Den erhaltenen Daten zufolge befindet sich tief im Tempelkomplex ein heiliger Reaktor, der von den Rebellen erobert wurde. Nur wenn die Steuerungselemente vor den Ketzern geschützt werden, ist das Relikt sicher.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

traits.locale_text: Die Verteidigung des Klosters des Adeptus Mechanicus wurde überwunden: Das sofortige Eingreifen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist erforderlich. Den erhaltenen Daten zufolge befindet sich tief im Tempelkomplex ein heiliger Reaktor, der von den Rebellen erobert wurde. Nur wenn die Steuerungselemente vor den Ketzern geschützt werden, ist das Relikt sicher.

languages.text: Les défenses du monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ont cédé : l'intervention immédiate {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est requise. D'après les données récupérées, les profondeurs du temple capturé par les rebelles cachent un réacteur sacré. Pour en assurer la sécurité, il faut empêcher les hérétiques d'accéder aux panneaux de contrôle de la relique.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

traits.locale_text: Les défenses du monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ont cédé : l'intervention immédiate {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est requise. D'après les données récupérées, les profondeurs du temple capturé par les rebelles cachent un réacteur sacré. Pour en assurer la sécurité, il faut empêcher les hérétiques d'accéder aux panneaux de contrôle de la relique.

languages.text: 机械修会修道院的防御已经遭到破坏，行商浪人需要立提供援助。获得的数据显示，被叛军占领的修道院深处，隐藏着神圣的反应堆。行商浪人必须保护神圣反应堆的控制面板免受异端分子入侵，才能保护所有人的安全。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会修道院的防御已经遭到破坏，行商浪人需要立提供援助。获得的数据显示，被叛军占领的修道院深处，隐藏着神圣的反应堆。行商浪人必须保护神圣反应堆的控制面板免受异端分子入侵，才能保护所有人的安全。

languages.text: 帝国技術局修道院の防衛が破られた。自由開拓者による即時介入が必要だ。入手したデータによると、神聖なリアクターは反乱軍に占拠された寺院の奥深くに隠されている。異端者たちから遺物の制御パネルを守ることのみが、その安全を保証する。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局修道院の防衛が破られた。自由開拓者による即時介入が必要だ。入手したデータによると、神聖なリアクターは反乱軍に占拠された寺院の奥深くに隠されている。異端者たちから遺物の制御パネルを守ることのみが、その安全を保証する。

languages.text: Las defensas del monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus han caído: es necesaria la intervención inmediata por parte de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Según los datos obtenidos, hay un reactor sagrado oculto en las profundidades del complejo capturado por los rebeldes. Solo protegiendo los paneles de control de la reliquia contra los rebeldes se puede garantizar su seguridad.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. According to the acquired data, a sacred reactor is hidden in the depths of the temple complex captured by the rebels. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.

Solo protegiendo los paneles de control de la reliquia contra los rebeldes se puede garantizar su seguridad.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus manastırının savunması aşılmış. Hür Tacir'in duruma derhâl müdahale etmesi gerekiyor. Elde edilen veriler ışığında, kutsal bir reaktörün, isyancıların ele geçirdiği tapınağın derinliklerinde yer aldığı öğrenildi. Bu kadim eseri korumanın tek yolu, kâfirleri kontrol panelinden uzak tutmaktan geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Mechanicus monastery's defences have been breached: immediate intervention by the Rogue Trader is required. Only protecting the relic's control panels from the heretics will ensure its safety.
